post.description:
Process natural language queries

Examples:
- "ce comenzi am astazi?"
- "cate comenzi am facut in ultima luna?"
- "care sunt comenzile mele?"
- "cat am vandut saptamana asta?"

get.description: Get list of available query intents for AI agents

post.description:
Process natural language query using AI (OpenRouter - Gemini 2.5 Flash)

Exemple de ??ntreb??ri:
- "Ce comenzi am ast??zi?"
- "C??te comenzi am f??cut ??n ultima lun?? ??i c??t am c????tigat?"
- "Ce task-uri am de f??cut?"
- "Spune-mi despre inventarul meu"
- "C??nd trebuie s?? recoltez?"
- "Ce culturi am plantate?"
